thread.title: IN MEMES: So Trevor has a house? We are all coming over!
thread.title_full: IN MEMES: So Trevor has a house? We are all coming over!

title: IN MEMES: So Trevor has a house? We are all coming over!
text:
13 pictures of Trevor Noah's new R130 million Manhattan apartment 
Riddled with mixed reactions, South Africans found themselves happy, sad, but mostly jealous of the comedian. Look at your life? LOL! That time Trevor Noah thought he wasn't black enough so he moved, but SAns are reminding him to "uplift communities". Black tax level 1000 pic.twitter.com/Een5ToVPPO — Young Matau (@Umi_Slays) February 28, 2017 so you ppl want Trevor Noah to stop buying things that make him happy with his own money to save a country that doesn't want to be saved? pic.twitter.com/VdzCmnSSxg — njabulo mbatha (@fourrforty) February 28, 2017 "Trevor Noah doesn't give back to the societ " pic.twitter.com/ingDNOyEfR
